title: Heat things up with the Dragon icon

replies.body: "Doesn't require any sword-swinging, just buy it!"  ...I think it'd prefer sword-swinging or thrilling heroics.

I *literally* logged in to say what you said.

LUCKILY you can spend RL money on this instead of playing for it!!!

...not.
I came to say this exact thing lmao
If I got 1 RP for every time I missed {{summoner:11}} on Dragon, I could buy this icon.
I could buy Pulsefire Ezreal.
I could buy Riot themselves.
I could buy bill gates and the entirety of Microsoft
y'all shouldnt jungle XD
Well played...{{summoner:3}}
I could buy Graves his Cigar.
I could buy a potato

{{champion:82}} is training his new pet, Dragon.
{{champion:223}} makes out with his lover, Gromp.
{{champion:54}} reunites with his brother, Ancient Krug.
{{champion:60}} dances with her husband before she eats him, Vilemaw.

the jungle doesn't seem so lonely now that everyone has someone <3 C:

{{champion:96}} Is happy to see his dad again, Baron Nashor.
{{champion:19}} Goes hunting with his cousins, Murk Wolves
{{champion:143}} Wonders how a fellow plant is on fire but not dying, Red Brambleback.
{{champion:103}} Has fun with her shy friend, who only dances with her, Blue Sentinel.
{{champion:268}} Finally finds his long lost wife and children, Raptors.
{{champion:98}} Dashes back and forth with his girlfriend in their river home, Rift Scuttler.
{{champion:107}} Searches for his rarest prize, Elusive Rift Duck.
this is beautiful, someone give this person a medal!

Wait, Vilemaw is male?
Now I have to reevaluate my life.
omg lol i didnt know vilemaw was female fml xD

Huh.  A little bit of research tells me that Vilemaw is the "god" of Elise's spider cult, and though I could not find definitively one way or the other, it's always referred to with male pronouns.
So you were right, but I just guessed all this time that Vilemaw was a female since I compared it to Shelob from LOTR.
i want a Vilemsaw icon, like now.... Also, wouldn't Shyvana be more fitting for the Dragon? They are a couple after all(This is how rumors are spread)

There is a vilemaw icon :D
It was a reward for last year's harrowing event.
No one in the jungle loves amumu tho ;-; will he be sad forever??? ;-;
I wish more of these icons were purchasable with IP, I have more than I know what to do with these days:D
I've been asking for the ability to 'buy' a new level 30 smurf account, or something similar, with IP. Because it's stupid to just have it buildup like this...

And uh... That's called smurfing which... Riot specifically said is against Summoner's Code. Plus, to get a "new level 30" acc for free is bad policy. Cause you know those with all the IP in the world would use their IP that they have nothing to do with to buy friends a level 30 acc. Where they got no experience of playing the game from those levels. So you get newbies in low elo running into towers and feeding. Making Bronze the impossible challenge.

> [{quoted}](name=Kale42,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=z5xamgAp,comment-id=000e00000000,timestamp=2015-08-26T23:50:18.353+0000)
>
> And uh... That's called smurfing which... Riot specifically said is against Summoner's Code. Plus, to get a "new level 30" acc for free is bad policy. Cause you know those with all the IP in the world would use their IP that they have nothing to do with to buy friends a level 30 acc. Where they got no experience of playing the game from those levels. So you get newbies in low elo running into towers and feeding. Making Bronze the impossible challenge.

? You just have to do it intelligently. Link it to the previous accounts just like a new character under your single wow account. And if the MMR system is intelligent then it would quickly figure out your skill level and move you to the appropriate tier. There's a reason why most pros have multiple 'smurfs'. The mental reset that comes from a new perspective is immensely valuable.
{{champion:82}} Huehuehuehuehuehuehue
Is this a subtle hint that we need a ghost dragon icon?
Subtlety doesn't seem to be Mordekaiser's strength.  Or yours, apparently.

Riot should have the champion icons we use for posts here as regular icons. The could be prizes for reaching level 5 champion masteries. One you hit level 5 with Thresh, you get this: {{champion:412}}. Plus, when they update splash arts, they could leave people with the old icons, but still give them the new one too. That way, you can say "I played Poppy before she was reworked." Not that Poppy will ever get a rework...

"Luckily, you can buy this instead of actually earning it"
My face when i read this: {{champion:5}}
Icons should be purchasable with IP.
i really want icons for IP {{item:3070}}
Ao Shin teasers?!

Meddler DID say we should "expect to be surprised" for the next champion released. I'm hoping it's Ao Shin, but it probably won't be. Then again I'm also thinking: Maybe that's why it's a surprise, because I won't expect it? Either way you look at it, it's over five years this game has existed, and it's high time people can play as a dragon.

1 {{champion:102}} 
2 I'm sorry but the next champion is just a shaco clone...that's why it's a surprise...
There was also some talk a while back that I heard after five new champions last year to now ao shin may arrive or be worked on with teasers
The real final boss of summoner's rift. Hint, it's actually {{champion:45}}
I guess you could say that things are getting pretty "heated" in LoL
No pun intended
Pretty sure the pun was extremely intentional.

You got a new summoner icon.

{{champion:29}} I got a new icon. Wonder what it is.(Clicks on new icon.)

{{champion:29}} Oh cool it's a dragon icon.(Get's smashed bye a morning star)

{{champion:82}} Give me back my dragon!(Smashes twitch repeatedly)

{{champion:29}} How-did you- get- in my- hou-se.

{{champion:82}} Veiger- left- the door- unlocked.

{{champion:106}} Freeze this is the police! Put your arms were I can see them!

{{champion:29}} Oh thank god this guy came in my house and attacked me.

{{champion:106}} Alright (puts handcuffs on criminal) your coming with me!

{{champion:29}} Wait what! But this is my house.

{{champion:106}}  Shut up dirt bag! I don't take kindly to pet snatchers.

{{champion:82}} Thank you officer. Now let's go Larry we got noobs to burn.

In the end Mordekaiser and Larry were reunited, Volibear received a medal of valor, and Twich served 5 years in prison.

Epilogue:

{{champion:45}} All right Twitch pizza's done- what the? (See's smashed Twitches Smashed up room) Did I leave the door unlocked again.
